div.div: Louisiana College vs. East Texas Baptist

tr.td: ETBU wins the toss and defers...LC will receive the ball.
Cory McNeil kickoff 55 yards to the LC10, Ira Jewitt return 28 yards to the LC38 (Clyde Omo-Iyase).
Tim Curry pass complete to Cortland Bell for 4 yards to the LC42 (Dylan Bethea).
Ryan Montague rush for 4 yards to the LC46 (Dylan Bethea;Dylan Benge).
Ryan Montague rush for 6 yards to the ETBU48, 1ST DOWN LC (Collin Bieschke).

Ryan Montague rush for loss of 2 yards to the ETBU40 (Dylan Benge).
Tim Curry pass incomplete to Ryan Montague.
Tim Curry pass complete to D'Mario Parker for loss of 1 yard to the ETBU41 (D.Bailey).
Tim Willett punt 39 yards to the ETBU2, downed.
